title: Question 16
prompt:
Sentence 19: If every American recycled, we can have less pollution and use less energy.

Which correction should be made to sentence 19?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
When a sentence contains the word “if,” it is talking about a possibility, something that might happen, not something that definitely will happen. In this sentence, the word “if” indicates a possibility in the future. The main verb of the sentence should also indicate possibility in the future, but the verb “can” in this sentence indicates ability. The verb “could” indicates a future possibility.


If every American recycled, we could have less pollution and use less energy.
